title: Skript插件怎么实现title效果
author: 浅梦l
txt_content: 如题，Title就是玩家视角显示的那种

replies.author: 西木凛
replies.txt_content:
浅梦l 发表于 2016-12-11 13:51
那我还想问一下，1.10版本的Skript能实现箱子菜单吗？
可以  你闲着没事干的话可以去弄  反正我是用chestcommand来做菜单好过用Sk来做菜单

replies.author: 西木凛
replies.txt_content:
command /hi:
    trigger:
        send player title "&9HEY!" with subtitle "&7You rule!" for 10 seconds

需要skript \ SkRayFall
